answers.answer: All I can do is rest, but im so used to being active, it ***** being in bed all day but I'm only 25 weeks so if I don't want a premature baby I have to stay at rest to keep my bp down

question: Been in the hospital for 3 days, hopefully I can go home today, I've been diagnosed . With preeclampsia so I've been getting monitored, but being in bed all day *****, but if it means saving my baby, I'll. Do what ever it takes, just hope I don't have to miss too much . School
title: hospital stay :(
